concept.title: 1552.217-70 Evaluation of contract options.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 1517.208(a), insert the following solicitation provision in Requests for Proposals when the solicitation contains options.

note.p: For award purposes, in addition to an offeror's response to the basic requirement, the Government will evaluate its response to all options, both technical and cost. Evaluation of options will not obligate the Government to exercise the options. For this solicitation the options are as specified in section H.
